all Very good Films from Brad Pitt
All these films were wonderful. The acting was outstanding. Everything that Brad Pitt does is fantastic. Loved Benjamin Button most of all. Great story.
4 great movies super low price other then babel and i can deal with that lol but would def recommend

I  have actually seen all four of these films before and enjoyed them all, didn't have them in my library (except Troy) so this seemed like a good deal at the right price. There are 4 disks in the folder. By the way if you are a Pitt fan check out his great performance as a crazy in a luny bin as a supporting actor to Bruce Willis in 12 Monkeys.
Not only did I get the Benjamin Button movie, but I got 3 of Brad Pitts other movies as a bonus
It's Brad... c'mon!! But seriously, he's a great actor and I truly loved all 4 films. Nice to add to my collection..
Very biased review as I have more of Brad Pitt's movies than anyone else. This collection was a perfect addition and 4 separate dvd's which is a bonus.
Love Brad Pitt and the movies are great. All in one case.
Great movie & cast
Good price all good movies
As I was unable to find a copy of Benjamin Button on its own, this will have to do. It also had the movie Seven and Troy in it, Brad Pitt classics!
Loved all the movies and the price was great
What a fantastic group for a steal! I have seen them all and got this for a gift!
Great movies !
Love Brad Pitt movies no matter what character he plays so this was a great buy, thank you!
A good buy...I am in awe of the actors. I'm very happy with the variety in one buy.
I saw Babel recently and yea this guy can act. The other movies I have seen in the past and are equally good. For the $ you really can't go wrong.
Entertaining DVD set.
Love it
all good
You can't miss with four Brad Pitt movies.

If you enjoy Brad Pitt as an actor and/or just for I candy, you cannot beat the price of this DVD with the fantastic assorted movies An excellent investment which I do not hesitate to recommend. Enjoy!
Great
The only film we have watched is the Curious Case of Benjamin Button.  My daughter really loved the film but I was less enthused.  It is a good film but I felt the ending left a  lot to be desired.
Great deal.  Great price.  Love all 4 movies.

Babel is the only reason this gets 5 stars. Babel is a freaking masterpiece. Maybe not for everyone but a masterpiece. This gave me a chance to rewatch Se7en and it's kinda outdated. Troy is a waste of time.
Great Brad Pitt movie compilation. Received product quickly and almost brand new.
I bought it to see Benjamin Button and got all the bonus movies with it.
